privacy.title: AirShare Privacy Policy
privacy.sections.1.title: 1. Preamble
privacy.sections.1.body: This privacy policy ("Privacy Policy") governs the processing of personal data and technical information by AirShare ("we", "our" or the "Application") in compliance with applicable data protection regulations, including but not limited to Regulation (EU) 2016/679 ("GDPR") and applicable national regulations. Use of the Application implies acceptance of the conditions and methods of data processing described below.
privacy.sections.2.title: 2. Data Controller
privacy.sections.2.body: The data controller is the user itself, as the user of the Application in an exclusively local environment. No personal data is collected, processed or stored by third parties or external servers.
privacy.sections.3.title: 3. Nature of Processing and Personal Data Involved
privacy.sections.3.intro: AirShare is designed to operate exclusively in a local environment (local network, LAN), without the use of external infrastructures or cloud services. Consequently, no external identifying personal data is collected. The technical data processed, limited to the context of the local network, includes but is not limited to:
privacy.sections.3.list.1: Unique transaction identifiers (e.g. UUID assigned to each transfer)
privacy.sections.3.list.2: File name and size subject to transfer
privacy.sections.3.list.3: Type of transfer (e.g. file sent or received)
privacy.sections.3.list.4: Completion status or anomalies related to transfer
privacy.sections.3.list.5: Names of sender and receiver devices
privacy.sections.3.list.6: Timestamps related to transfer start and duration
privacy.sections.3.list.8: Category or type of device involved (e.g. desktop, mobile)
privacy.sections.3.outro: Such data is managed exclusively locally and is not transmitted, shared or disclosed to third parties or external infrastructures.
privacy.sections.4.title: 4. Purposes and Legal Basis of Processing
privacy.sections.4.body: The processing of the data indicated above is intended exclusively for the correct operation of the file transfer service between devices connected to the same local network. In compliance with applicable regulations, the legal basis for processing is represented by the performance of the service requested by the user.
privacy.sections.5.title: 5. Processing Methods and Data Security
privacy.sections.5.body: Data transfer occurs without any passage through external servers or cloud services, limiting all activities exclusively to the user's local network. For the protection of confidentiality and integrity, data and transferred files are encrypted using advanced AES-256 encryption algorithms, adopted to prevent unauthorized access, tampering or unlawful interception during the transfer process.
privacy.sections.6.title: 6. Data Retention
privacy.sections.6.body: Data regarding transfers is stored exclusively locally on the user's device and persists for a limited time, defined by the user itself through Application features, or until manual deletion. AirShare does not perform any remote archiving.
privacy.sections.7.title: 7. User Rights and Exercise Methods
privacy.sections.7.intro: Pursuant to applicable regulations, the user has the right to:
privacy.sections.7.list.1: Access technical data stored locally and know its content
privacy.sections.7.list.2: Request correction of any inaccurate information
privacy.sections.7.list.3: Obtain complete deletion of data and cessation of processing
privacy.sections.7.list.4: Object to any unlawful use or non-compliance with this policy
privacy.sections.8.title: 8. Absence of Profiling and Monitoring
privacy.sections.8.body: AirShare does not perform any form of user profiling, nor does it collect information for marketing or behavioral analysis purposes. No cookies, tracking tools, tags, beacons or other similar technologies that may collect personal or anonymous data are used.
privacy.sections.9.title: 9. Exclusion of Warranties and Limitation of Liability
privacy.sections.9.body: Although the Application adopts technical measures to ensure transfer security and integrity, no absolute guarantee is offered regarding complete absence of losses, corruption or compromise of transferred files. The user commits to performing regular backups and to using AirShare under its sole responsibility, releasing the developer from any civil, criminal or contractual liability for damages, direct or indirect, arising from software use.
privacy.sections.10.title: 10. Changes to Privacy Policy
privacy.sections.10.body: We reserve the right to make changes, updates or additions to this policy at any time to adapt it to regulatory updates or functional changes to the Application. Users are required to periodically review the updated version published.
terms.title: AirShare Terms of Service
terms.sections.1.title: 1. Preamble
terms.sections.1.body: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern the use of the AirShare application ("Application"), developed to enable file transfer between devices connected to the same local network. Access to and use of the Application imply full and unreserved acceptance of these Terms by the user.
terms.sections.2.title: 2. Service Description
terms.sections.2.body: AirShare is software designed exclusively to operate in a local environment, enabling direct exchange of files between devices connected to the same LAN, without the use of external services, servers or cloud infrastructures. The only data processed is technical and limited to the context of transfer, as described in the Privacy Policy.
terms.sections.3.title: 3. Terms of Use
terms.sections.3.body: The user commits to using the Application in full compliance with applicable laws and not to use it for unlawful, harmful or dishonest activities. Strict prohibition on using AirShare for transfer of illegal, offensive, copyright-protected or rights-infringing content without authorization.
terms.sections.4.title: 4. User Responsibility
terms.sections.4.body: The user is solely responsible for proper management of transferred files, including backup and preservation. AirShare does not guarantee complete integrity, security or availability of transferred data nor assumes responsibility for any losses, corruptions, deletions or damages resulting from use or Application malfunction.
terms.sections.5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
terms.sections.5.body: To the maximum extent permitted by law, AirShare disclaims all liability for direct, indirect, consequential or incidental damages arising from the use or inability to use the Application, including but not limited to data loss, lost profits, business interruption or device damage.
terms.sections.6.title: 6. Absence of Warranty
terms.sections.6.body: The Application is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranty, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose or non-infringement of third-party rights.
terms.sections.7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
terms.sections.7.body: All intellectual property rights relating to the Application, including source code, trademarks, logos and associated materials, are the exclusive property of the developer and are protected by applicable copyright and industrial property laws.
terms.sections.8.title: 8. Changes to Terms
terms.sections.8.body: AirShare reserves the right to modify or update these Terms at any time, effective immediately upon publication of the new version in the Application or through user notification. Continued use of the Application constitutes tacit acceptance of modifications.
terms.sections.9.title: 9. Term and Termination
terms.sections.9.body: These Terms are valid from the date of acceptance and remain in effect until cessation of Application use. The user may discontinue use of the Application at any time; AirShare reserves the right to suspend or terminate access in case of serious or repeated breach of Terms.
terms.sections.10.title: 10. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
terms.sections.10.body: These Terms are governed by Italian law. For any dispute relating to the interpretation or execution of the Terms, the Court of Padua shall have exclusive jurisdiction, unless otherwise mandated by applicable law.
